metadata.description: What would you do if you accidentally broke your best friend's prized possession? Would you tell them, or hide it? Join Banana Tail the monkey, along with his friends Tic Tac, a plaid zebra, and Slubb the hippo, as they try to solve the mystery of why their best friend Reena, the color-changing rhino, is distraught and changing into a unique array of colors right in front of their eyes!
metadata.name: Banana Tail's Colorful Adventure
